metadata.title: CVE-2024-38859 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: XSS in the view page with the SLA column configured in Checkmk versionsprior to 2.3.0p14, 2.2.0p33, 2.1.0p47 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allowed malicioususers to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elements into the SLAcolumn title. These scripts could be executed when the view page was clonedby other users.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
